summary.Title: Join the production team of wind turbines and become a part of Vestas in Nakskov
summary.JobHeadline: Join the production team of wind turbines and become a part of Vestas in Nakskov
summary.Presentation: We are currently looking for motivated and flexible unskilled workers for permanent positions starting in Spring 2022.

WorkPlace.Name: JKS a/s, Nykøbing
WorkPlace.Description: JKS er Danmarks største vikar- og rekrutteringsbureau med filialer over hele landet og 20 års erfaring. Vi har et indgående kendskab til lokalområdet, hvilket er en forudsætning for at finde spændende opgaver til vores medarbejdere. Desuden lægger vi vægt på, at der er styr på instruktion, udstyr m.v. - og at lønnen udbetales korrekt og til tiden. Hos JKS tilbyder vi vikariater af kortere og længere varighed, Try & Hire-forløb, projektansættelser samt rekruttering til fastansættelse.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Join the production team of wind turbines and become a part of Vestas in Nakskov
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are currently looking for motivated and flexible unskilled workers for permanent positions starting in Spring 2022.


Work assignments:
You will be working in a culture where safety, quality and well-being are paramount - an attractive workplace with a good atmosphere.

Your tasks will include:

  • Construction of wing's structure
  • Construction of webs in fiberglass and core materials
  • Preparation and maintenance of wings
  • Preparing wings for painting
You will be working on 2 shifts: day and evening shift


Requirements:

  • You are motivation for physical work
  • You are independant, reliable and collaborative
  • You are flexible and can shift between working day and evening shift (every other week)
  • You can use necessary tools
  • You must speak English and/or Danish
  • It is a big advantage if you already have experience from similar work

We offer:

  • Employment ny a leading Danish staffing company
  • Temporary work on Danish working conditions
  • Possibility of long term cooperation
  • Salary paid every 2 weeks
  • Additional holiday pay 12,5 %
  • We provide administrative help with tax card, health insurance if needed

If you have any questions; please contact Head of Office Puk Sofie Lebek on mobile: +45 6163 0711 or on email: psl@jks.dk
